tool_description: Analyzes power quality metrics including total harmonic distortion, voltage unbalance, flicker, and power factor from measurement data.

voltage_measurements.description: Array of voltage measurements in volts

current_measurements.description: Array of current measurements in amperes

nominal_voltage.description: Nominal system voltage in volts (100 to 800000)

nominal_frequency.description: Nominal system frequency in Hz (50 or 60)

error_messages: Measurement array mismatch: Voltage and current arrays must have the same length.
Invalid nominal voltage: Must be between 100 and 800000 volts.
Invalid nominal frequency: Must be either 50 or 60 Hz.
Insufficient data points: Minimum 10 measurements required for analysis.
Analysis window error: Use one of [1min, 10min, 1hour].
usage: Provide voltage_measurements, current_measurements, and nominal_voltage. Optionally set nominal_frequency and analysis_window. Returns comprehensive power quality metrics.

thd_voltage.description: Total harmonic distortion of voltage as percentage

thd_current.description: Total harmonic distortion of current as percentage

quality_grade.description: Overall power quality grade: excellent, good, fair, poor
